==============
PurchaseTicket
==============


A graphical example of using the web3 api to check balances and `purchase tickets <https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/PurchaseTicket>`_.

You can see it in action at `https://tickets.fusionnetwork.io/ <https://tickets.fusionnetwork.io/>`_ or browse the code at our GitHub repository `https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/PurchaseTicket <https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/PurchaseTicket>`_.
